item.title: Collaborations
item.description: University affiliations Our members are jointly affiliated with: the University of Edinburgh Quantum informatics department and the Sorbonne University and French National Center for Scientific Research LIP6 - Quantum Information Team Partner consortiums We are partnered with a number of partner research and industrial consortiums. Autonomous quantum technologies Quantum Computing Platform for NISQ Era Commercial Application Open Air Quantum Key Distribution Quantum Computing and Simulation Photonics Quantum Sampling Machine Quantum Internet Alliance Calcul Securis√© Multipartite pour Architectures NISQ Quantum Algorithms for Massive Data
